name: zn-frontend-multi-config
description: Helper library for working with multiple configurations in Zengine frontend plugins.

scripts.concat: mkdir -p dist && concat -o dist/zn-frontend-multi-config.js src/znFrontendMultiConfig.module.js src/znFrontendMultiConfig.service.js src/znFrontendMultiConfig.controller.js
scripts.build: npm run concat && npm run minify

author: Alex Weber <alex.weber@wizehive.com
